item.title: Thousands of Afghans were moved to UK in secret scheme after data breach
item.description: The existence of the scheme could not be reported until now because of a court injunction.

item.title: From military ruler to democrat - ex-Nigeria President Buhari's life in pictures
item.description: Muhammadu Buhari’s life tracked dramatic changes over decades – and he was often at the centre of events.

item.title: Israeli strikes kill 12 in Lebanon's Bekaa Valley, governor says
item.description: The Israeli military said it had struck a number of military compounds belonging to the armed group Hezbollah.

item.title: Two dead after flash flooding in New Jersey and New York City
item.description: The New Jersey governor has declared a state of emergency as some roads are blocked and subways delayed.

item.title: Fourteen people arrested after anti-migrant riots in southern Spain
item.description: Clashes were sparked after an alleged attack on a man in his 60s by three Moroccan men.
